Edgar_Degas.history: A French Impressionist artist famous for his paintings, sculptures, prints, and drawings, particularly of dancers.

Francisco_Goya.history: A Spanish romantic painter and printmaker, considered one of the last of the Old Masters and one of the first of the moderns.

Pablo_Picasso.history: A Spanish painter and sculptor who co-founded the Cubist movement and revolutionized modern art.

Rembrandt.history: A Dutch painter and printmaker, widely regarded as one of the greatest visual artists in history.
famous_works: The Anatomy Lesson of Dr. Nicolaes Tulp

Vincent_van_Gogh.history: A Dutch Post-Impressionist painter who created over 2,100 artworks and profoundly influenced modern art.
